EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Event_WWDCDinner_Q214.Reminder invite from Michael Kahn
EmailTemplate.subject: Seats filling up fast â€“ RSVP today for dinner with Pivotal Labs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}}, Spots are filling up fast for our WWDC dinner at Absinthe in Hayes Valley on Monday, June 2, 2014 at 6:30 p.m. Simply reply to this email to RSVP.
Date: Monday, June 2, 2014 Time: 6:30 p.m. PDT Location: Absinthe SF, 398 Hayes St, San Francisco, CA 94102 Looking forward to having you join us for this invite-only dinner with some of the top mobile experts in the industry.
Regards, Michael Michael Kahn Director, Business Development Pivotal Labs 650.422.1198
